changes.description: Fix short press actions not being triggered by quick button clicks.
Optimize characters usage for the `helper_last_controller_event` text input.

Migrate to Zigbee2MQTT MQTT Device Triggers. The `controller_entity` input is deprecated and `controller_device` is now mandatory. Remove `controller_entity` from your automation and configure `controller_device` with your controller device ID. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Standardize input naming format for controller devices and virtual button actions. No functionality changes.
Fix trigger_delta regex with optional whitespacing. (Thanks [@TTvanWillegen](https://github.com/TTvanWillegen))
Add additional manufacturer name for zha/deConz. ([EPMatt-issue#766](https://github.com/EPMatt/awesome-ha-blueprints/issues/766)) ([@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Improve Last Controller Event Helper JSON Regex with more lenient matching.

Changed short button presses to use _press_release. ([EPMatt-issue#934](https://github.com/EPMatt/awesome-ha-blueprints/issues/934)) ([@queimadus](https://github.com/queimadus)) ([@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
